text: Fortunato Ilario Carafa della Spina (1630–1697) was a Roman Catholic cardinal. ==Biography== On 5 Oct 1687, he was consecrated bishop by Savo Millini, Bishop of Orvieto, with Francesco Pannocchieschi d'Elci, Archbishop of Pisa, serving as co-consecrator. ==References== Category:1630 births Category:1697 deaths Category:Cardinals (Catholic Church)
title: Fortunato Ilario Carafa della Spina
